Your Internet connection appears to be w: ظاهرا خط اینترنت شما کار می کند. شما می توانید این پنجره را ببندید و به استفاده از دستگاه خود ادامه دهید.
Why is this window appearing?: چرا این پنجره به نمایش در می آید؟
elementary OS automatically checks your: elementary OS automatically checks your Internet connection when you connect to a new WiFi network. If it detects there is not an Internet connection (i.e. if you are connecting to a captive portal at a coffee shop or other public location), this window will appear and display the login page.
Some networks can appear to be a captive: Some networks can appear to be a captive portal at first, triggering this window, then actually end up connecting. In those cases, you'll see this message and can safely close the window.
